Package peregrine.worker

Worker daemon including PFS (partitioned filesystem) support as well as main daemon interface (RPC, etc).

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ErrorLoggingChannelUpstreamHandler  
FSBaseDirectCallable  
FSDeleteDirectHandler Handles HTTP DELETE of files in PFS.
FSGetDirectHandler Handles HTTP GET of files in the filesystem.
FSHeadDirectHandler HTTP HEAD on files within Peregrine.
FSPutBaseHandler Base handler for dealing with logging throughput and other issues with PUT.
FSPutDirectHandler  
FSPutShuffleHandler Handles HTTP PUT shuffle messages.
GetConfig Parse the config and return the correct amount of memory to constrain the VM.
GetMaxDirectMemory Parse the config and return the correct amount of memory to constrain the VM.
HeartbeatTimer The HeartbeatTimer sends heartbeat messages to the controller regularly so that we know that this worker is still alive.
HexPipelineEncoder  
HttpResponseLoggingChannelHandler Handler to log all HTTP requests.
Initializer Initializer for bringing up the system.
Main Command line main() class for the worker daemon.
Pidfile Command line main() class for the worker daemon.
StorageBroadcastTimer Broadcast storage metadata to the controller.
WaitForDaemon With a given pid, port, and timeout, wait until either the port is successfully opened and ready for IO or the pid terminates.
WorkerDaemon Main daemon for handling filesystem operations.
WorkerHandler Handles all HTTP requests sent to a worker.
WorkerPipelineFactory  
 

Package peregrine.worker Description

Worker daemon including PFS (partitioned filesystem) support as well as main daemon interface (RPC, etc).
